answers.answer: Just as a thought, you could put any pictures from magazines of all different kinds and ages of kids (and adults) with the heading that Juvenile Diabetes is diagnosed every 8 minutes (or whenever).

question: I am doing a fundraising walk through the JDRF, 'Walk to Cure Diabetes', at the local fair I am going to have a fundraising booth with a home baked goods baked sale, and a silent auction.  I want to do a display that different kids (or adults) that has pictures of them on it, all who have juvenile diabetes.  If anyone is willing to send me a pic of their loved ones with juvenile diabetes for my display, I would really appreciate it.  Also please include first name, age and date of diagnosis.  My email address is ***@****.  Thanks in advance for anyone willing to help!!!
title: The Faces of Juvenile Diabetes
